title: UltraSonoro
shortDescription: What is silence? This projects investigate the sensorially unknown world, taking a look at apparently quiet places while offering the user sounds coming from the inaudible sound spectrum.

title: CorpoSonoro
shortDescription: Capturing body movements with a Kinect V2 and transforming them into sound experiences. Built with MAX/MSP.

title: 3D Fantasy Models
shortDescription: Some of the models I like to create in my free time with Blender.
